urls.title: High Five | LBBOnline
urls.description: Little Black Book, High Five asks the industry's experts to share their  best five pieces of work from their country released in the past few months. It’s as simple as that, really! We think the best way for LBB to really get the international advertising and marketing communities inspired by great local work is to get the local experts involved.

data.text:
This week sees Havas' Paul Ward sharing all-time favourite ads, Eleanor Films' Sophie Gold champions craft and storytelling & Special US' Chidalu Motanya looks at how to craft a different perspective.
